channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Pivotal Container Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Pivotal Container Service

item.title: CVE-2018-15763|2024-09-16T18:48:32.330Z -- pivotal -- pivotal%20container%20service
item.description: Pivotal Container Service, versions prior to 1.2.0, contains an information disclosure vulnerability which exposes IaaS credentials to application logs. A malicious user with access to application logs may be able to obtain IaaS credentials and perform actions using these credentials.
